body_html:
I think that is perhaps better accomplished via tf.cond? https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.10/api_docs/python/control_flow_ops.html#cond

(The reason it is "better" is that, if implemented carefully, tf.cond doesn't evaluate both branches, whereas tf.select with this feature would always evaluate both branches). Please comment if you disagree!

body:
I think that is perhaps better accomplished via tf.cond?  https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/r0.10/api_docs/python/control_flow_ops.html#cond

(The reason it is "better" is that, if implemented carefully, tf.cond doesn't evaluate both branches, whereas tf.select with this feature would always evaluate both branches).  Please comment if you disagree!
